name: RutonyChat - Restream Server
detailed_description:
DLC for the program RutonyChat.

Starting the local server, which allows you to splite the stream into several streams of sites without re-encoding, from your computer. The only thing that is required is a broader Internet channel.

The advantage is that you do not depend on the services of intermediaries, which under certain circumstances on their part, can cause problems until the broadcast falls.

short_description: Starting the local server, which allows you to splite the stream into several streams of sites without re-encoding, from your computer.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 1 GHz+
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: .NET Framework 4.5.2 x86
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: latest processors
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: .NET Framework 4.5.2 x86
